textAvisoInfoUpdate:
This is not a TSO certified product to be a flight instrument.
Urano Avionics is not responsible of the possible damages, total or partial destruction of any part of the airplane caused by the operation of this instrument.
The manufacturer will not be responsible of the damages caused by it's use, falling responsibility in the pilot in command of the airplane.
It's use is recommended accompanied by backup instrumentation.
For a correct use, it is essential to read the user's manual in detail.
You can consult the operation of the system and consult in detail the limitations and guarantees acquired when buying this instrument.
textAvisoConf: All values are expressed in Km/h
textWarn1: Value outside limits. Enter a correct value.
textWarn2: The value could not be updated.
textApagar2: Do you really want to turn off the system?
textReiniciar2: Do you really want to restart the system?
textActualizar2: Do you confirm the system update?
textErrActualizar2: The system could not be updated.
